thread.title: Benzer Pharmacy Ranks 39 on 2015 Florida Fast 100 List
thread.title_full: Benzer Pharmacy Ranks 39 on 2015 Florida Fast 100 List

author: Emah Madegwa, Media and PR Manager
title: Benzer Pharmacy Ranks 39 on 2015 Florida Fast 100 List
text:
Benzer Pharmacy has made this year’s Florida Fast 100 list released September 18, 2015. The list ranks the fastest-growing, Florida-based private companies by percentage revenue growth from 2012 to 2014. Benzer Pharmacy, a leading independent retail pharmacy chain, has been ranked 39 out of 100 with a two-year revenue growth of 164 percent.
“Benzer Pharmacy is delighted to once again be recognized and mentioned among the thriving and influential companies represented in this years Florida Fast 100,” says Manish Patel, CEO of Benzer Pharmacies.
2015 has been a tremendous year for the pharmacy. Following the rebranding of the organization from Rx Care Pharmacy to Benzer Pharmacy, there has been an explosive growth with numerous recognitions.
“The Florida Fast 100 recognition comes a month after the company earned the position of 1500 on the 2015 Inc. 5000 list released August 12, 2015,” explains Alpesh Patel, President of Benzer Pharmacies.
The pharmacy has been recognized by many organizations, including: the top 50 drug store operators in North America by Chain Drug Review, voted favorite pharmacy in the ‘Best of Fuquay-Varina Healthcare’ category, and achieved PCAB compounding accreditation with the Accreditation Commission for Health Care (ACHC).
“The economy in our state has been showing steady growth, and Tampa in particular continues to be a leading market in Florida’s economic resurgence. Benzer Pharmacy is excited to contribute to this with our place in the healthcare industry,” says Alpesh.
“Following a successful track record and phenomenal customer service, Benzer Pharmacy is confident that the aggressive growth trajectory will continue beyond 2015 as we are expected to open six more stores across Tampa Bay,” concludes Alpesh.
Companies on the Florida Fast 100 List provided documentation to verify the reported revenue figures. Information was gathered by the research directors for the four Florida markets (Orlando Business Journal; South Florida Business Journal; Jacksonville Business Journal; Tampa Bay Business Journal). In order to qualify, companies must be headquartered in Florida, privately-held, for-profit organizations, in business prior to 1/1/2012 and with revenues greater than $1 million in 2012 or $5 million in 2014. Visit http://www.bizjournals.com/tampabay/
####
ABOUT BENZER PHARMACY
Benzer Pharmacy is a chain of independent retail pharmacies specializing in compound and specialty medications. Benzer focuses on the customer’s needs by offering over-the-counter products, health consultations, and personalized care. With over 40 locations throughout Florida, Michigan, Virginia, North Carolina, Texas, Tennessee, Georgia, Nevada, and Louisiana, Benzer Pharmacy is dedicated to improving the health of its customers and strives to exceed customers' expectations by providing convenient access to personalized pharmaceutical services. All Benzer Pharmacy medications require a doctor's prescription. For more information: http://www.benzerpharmacy.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BenzerPharmacy
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/benzerpharmacy
